item.title: Is LUNC Price Set for $0.00009? Triangle Pattern Signals a 10% Rise Ahead
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
Amidst a prevailing bearish sentiment in the crypto market, the LUNC price witnessed a corrective phase over the past two weeks. Starting from its peak of $0.0000968, the coin has experienced a significant 15% decline, settling at its current trading price of $0.0000818. However, the price trend turned sideways after hitting the bottom demand zone

item.title: Pro-Ripple Lawyer Says SEC Targets Crypto to Back Corporate Capitalism
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
John E. Deaton, a pro-XRP lawyer has stated that the Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) actions against the crypto industry reflect an underlying agenda to preserve corporate capitalism rather than protecting investors. Deaton highlights what he perceives as an attack on cryptocurrencies, particularly in the context of the SEC’s actions against Coinbase and Ripple. His

The post Pro-Ripple Lawyer Says SEC Targets Crypto to Back Corporate Capitalism appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Terra Luna Classic Burn Hits 70 Billion Milestone Ahead Major Burn By Binance
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The total LUNC burned by the Terra Luna Classic community reaches 70 billion, hitting another milestone in the community’s efforts to reduce the circulating supply of LUNC since May 18, 2022. The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance has burned almost 36 billion LUNC, contributing over 50% to the total LUNC burned until now. LUNC token

item.title: Cardano Founder Discusses Latest ADA Developments, XRP Lawsuit, And Crypto Regulations
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:

item.title: Binance And CEO CZ Facing Intense Scrutiny In Euro Area Amid Banking Woes: WSJ
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance and CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao is under intense scrutiny from regulators in the euro area after US SEC and CFTC lawsuits against Binance, according to the Wall Street Journal. Binance currently withdraws from several EU countries and the latest exit from Germany follows after the financial regulator advised Binance

item.title: Is Bitcoin Price Drop to $29000 a Setback or an Opportunity for Next Rally?
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
On July 24th Bitcoin price ended a month-long sideways trend in the seller’s favor with a breakdown below $29650 support. The bearish candle backed by a significant surge in trading volume reflects a higher conviction of further downfall. However, the BTC price failed to offer a significant follow-up and is still wavering in a retest

The post Is Bitcoin Price Drop to $29000 a Setback or an Opportunity for Next Rally? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Grayscale Releases Comment Letter On Bitcoin ETFs To US SEC
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto Market: Grayscale had on Thursday sent out a comment letter to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in relation to the spot Bitcoin ETF filings from companies including the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC). The letter pertains to Grayscale as well as seven other spot bitcoin ETF filings with the surveillance sharing agreements (SSAs).

The post Breaking: Grayscale Releases Comment Letter On Bitcoin ETFs To US SEC appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto Market: Grayscale had on Thursday sent out a comment letter to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in relation to the spot Bitcoin ETF filings from companies including the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC). The letter pertains to Grayscale as well as seven other spot bitcoin ETF filings with the surveillance sharing agreements (SSAs).

The post Breaking: Grayscale Releases Comment Letter On Bitcoin ETFs To US SEC appeared first on CoinGape.
